short_summary: Good acquisition for Hose Assembly & Gasket Seal Set.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. Items: 23 EA Seals and Gasket to be delivered to Halifax, 13 EA Seals and Gasket to be delivered to Esquimalt, 25 Hydraulic Hose Assemblies to be delivered to Halifax, 25 Hydraulic Hose Assemblies to be delivered to Esquimalt.
